Package skills

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GreetingSkill
    A skill that generates a greeting message
    Recipe
    Stores a simple recipe for testing purposes
    RecipeBook
    A simple recipe book singleton to store recipes
    RecipeCookingSkill
    A skill that checks if all the required ingredients are available and then provides the required instructions to cook the recipe
    RecipeSearchSkill
    A skill that searches for a recipe by requested ingredients
    RecipeSelectSkill
    A skill that selects a requested recipe by it's name
    WeatherSkill
    A skill that provides a random generated weather information for a given city
    WeatherSkillWithEmptyResponseAndQuestions
    A skill created only for test coverage
    WeatherSkillWithNullTransitionTrigger
    A skill created only for test coverage
    WeatherSkillWithWrongTransitionTrigger
    A skill created only for test coverage
